sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { StyleSheet, Image, Text, View, ImageBackground } from 'react-native';
import theme from '../style.js';

export default function Announcements() {
  return (
    <View style={styles.Container}>
      <View styles={styles.Header}>
        <View></View>
        <Text style={theme.Subtitle}>Humanitarian Announcements</Text>
      </View>
      <View style={styles.Frame5}>
        <View style={styles.Frame4}>
          <View style={styles.FriendsRow}>
            <View style={styles.Friend}>
              <View style={styles.Frame7}>
                <View style={styles.Frame6}>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt914}>
                    Donna Regali needs your help
                  </Text>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt829}>
                    Saint Bernard Hospital, Angel Street 21
                  </Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.Frame7}>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt539}>Short Information</Text>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt715}>
                    Donna needs donations for AB blood type.
                  </Text>
                </View>
              </View>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.Frame4}>
          <View style={styles.FriendsRow}>
            <View style={styles.Friend}>
              <View style={styles.Frame7}>
                <View style={styles.Frame6}>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt914}>
                    Donna Regali needs your help
                  </Text>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt829}>
                    Saint Bernard Hospital, Angel Street 21
                  </Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.Frame7}>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt539}>Short Information</Text>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt715}>
                    Donna needs donations for AB blood type.
                  </Text>
                </View>
              </View>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.Frame5}>
          <View style={styles.FriendsRow}>
            <View style={styles.Friend}>
              <View style={styles.Frame7}>
                <View style={styles.Frame6}>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt914}>
                    Donna Regali needs your help
                  </Text>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt829}>
                    Saint Bernard Hospital, Angel Street 21
                  </Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.Frame7}>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt539}>Short Information</Text>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt715}>
                    Donna needs donations for AB blood type.
                  </Text>
                </View>
              </View>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>
      </View>
    </View>
  );
}

  Container: {
    display: 'flex',
